mainText:
PROMO: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command! 

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this, my dear folks. I saunter into my Bank of Entitlement with a craving for a triple-shot soy latte and gold-plated croissant. Lo and behold, the teller has the audacity to inform me they don't serve breakfast! Naturally, I unleash a storm of entitlement, demanding a personal chef on standby at all times. And you know what? They complied. That's the power of entitlement, my friends. Ah, the sweet taste of victory!
